Game.Name: Dinotopia - The Timestone Pirates (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl)
Game.plot: Danger! Angry dinosaurs are poised for invasion. Scurvy pirates are hungry for treasure. And an ancient stone of unimaginable power is about to fall into the wrong hands. Take to the skies and prepare for battle -- only you can preserve the special world that is Dinotopia!http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/554988.htmlCheat: Enable Stage SkipAt the Title Screen press: Down, Down, Up, Up, Right, Left, B, Right, Left, A.To skip a stage, pause the game, and press Select.Cheat: Level SelectStep One: On the title screen enter the following code: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, A, Left, Right, B. Step Two: Press start after entering the code and select the game's credits. Let them roll all the way through. Step Three: After the credits are done rolling you will be in a farm setting filled with ladders. Atop each ladder is a platform with a numbered door. The number corresponds with the level you would like to select.
Game.Notes: Danger! Angry dinosaurs are poised for invasion. Scurvy pirates are hungry for treasure. And an ancient stone of unimaginable power is about to fall into the wrong hands. Take to the skies and prepare for battle -- only you can preserve the special world that is Dinotopia!
